settings.liquid: Save now on all Handsling Bikes

settings.text: Bespoke Bikes. Precision Built. Tailored to You.

settings.content:
Handsling custom carbon bikes combine low weight and stiffness with durability and comfort, delivering exceptional performance in a bespoke build configured around you. Each frame is painted in-house in the UK by our on-site team for a finish that’s uniquely yours.

FREE PAINT - Order before 31st January to get free paint (applies to Handsling colour palette only).

settings.title: Tailored Fit
settings.content: Bikes built to your exact measurements and riding style.

settings.title: Race Proven
settings.content: Developed in elite competition and trusted by champions.

settings.title: Premium Carbon Fibre
settings.content: Hand-laid Carbon fibre for maximum compaction – strong and lightweight frames.

settings.title: British Design
settings.content: Designed in Britain and painted in-house on site by the Handsling team, then assembled in our UK factory with care and precision.

settings.title: Lifetime Warranty
settings.content: Confidence backed by long-term support and service.

settings.title: Bespoke Carbon Bikes for Every Ride
settings.content: Each cyclist has unique goals, which is why we customise bespoke carbon bikes for every rider, in every discipline. Whether for the freedom of the open road, speed on the track, endurance over the course of a triathlon, or grind over gravel, Handsling delivers race-proven performance

settings.title: Kate Richardson Wins National Criterium Championship
settings.content: Sprint speed, sharp handling, and total confidence – Kate powered her Handsling tovictory at the UK’s biggest criterium race.

settings.title: Handsling Jakroo Racing equipped with A1R0evoS for 2026 season
settings.content: Handsling is confirmed as title sponsor and frame supplier to UK men's elite race team.

settings.title: Cameron Hounsell Crowned KeirinYouth Champion
settings.content: Explosive power meets precision control - Cameron stormed to a national youth Keirin title aboard the TR3evo track bike.

settings.title: Tour de Féminin Victory on the A1R0evo
settings.content: Across climbs and sprints, the A1R0evo proved its pedigree as Kate Richardson rode to stage-race glory in Europe.

settings.title: From Our Factory to Championship Titles
settings.content: A Handsling is born from British design and race proven by champions. From the boards of the velodrome to Europe’s toughest climbs, our performance bicycles have carried riders to national titles and international success.

Exclusivity is in the details. Handsling’s range of paint gives you the freedom to personalise your bespoke carbon bike with over 130 colour variations, each applied with precision by our specialist team in our UK factory paint booth.

settings.title: Race-Developed Geometry
settings.content: Engineered using knowledge gained in competition for unmatched handling and responsiveness.

settings.title: Exhaustive Fatigue Testing
settings.content: Over 500,000 cycles during testing, surpassing ISO-certification for strength and long-term reliability.

settings.title: Integrated Cable Routing
settings.content: Sleek aerodynamics and a clean look with hidden cables.

settings.title: Toray Carbon Fibre
settings.content: From Torayaca in Japan, tuned for explosive power transfer, lasting comfort, and lifetime durability.

settings.title: Lifetime Warranty
settings.content: Total confidence in every frame, backed for life.

settings.title: Truly Bespoke Builds
settings.content: From fit to finish, every Handsling bike is crafted to reflect you as a rider.

settings.title: Direct Factory Service
settings.content: Personal support from our Hampshire factory, guiding you from spec to assembly.

settings.title: Direct-to-Consumer Value
settings.content: Premium custom bikes, without the big-brand price tags.

settings.title: The Engineering Behind Our Custom Carbon Bikes
settings.content:
Handsling employs one of the best bicycle engineers in the business to bring our unique, in-house frame designs to life. The frames are then manufactured using the latest production techniques, such as latex-wrapped, EPS inner mould technology, followed by rigorous product testing, ensuring every Handsling frame meets the highest standards of carbon bike frame engineering.

That attention to detail runs through the whole range - from race-ready road bikes to all-day endurance builds.

settings.author: Francesca Selva, Italian Pro Rider with Team Torelli
settings.content: "Built for me..Stiff as I like, ready to sprint and precise on the downhill. Perfect"

settings.author: John Veness, 2x National MTB Champion
settings.content: "..the quality of every component is top class even down to the tubeless valves. You can tell it's handbuilt with a lot of care. It's just like a bike that I would build with cherry picked parts."

settings.author: Jamie Stewart - TSTRevo Yorkshire Junior TT Championship
settings.content: "Riding is...Like you are floating through the air"
"What a bike - very responsive, very comfortable, I would give it more stars if possible."
If you want a pro-level frame at a fraction of the price of those offered by more famous brands then Handsling is the place to look.

In the short time I have had the bike I know my fitness can't have improved, but I am going SO much faster...the bike is simply phenomenal. A long crawl uphill where I used to average around 12mph was covered yesterday at 15+mph; on the flat I'm regularly hitting over 25mph. Incredible.

settings.title: Product specification
settings.content: Give your customers useful information about your products and showcase differences between them.

settings.title: What makes carbon fibre a high-performance material for bicycles?
settings.content:
Carbon fibre delivers exceptional stiffness-to-weight, ideal for performance bikes. Handsling uses Toray T700, T800, and T1100 carbon. Latex-wrapped EPS internal moulds maximise carbon compaction, resulting in frames that are light, strong, durable, and comfortable over long
rides.

settings.title: What are the benefits of a carbon bike frame compared to titanium, aluminium or steel?
settings.content: Carbon fibre frames are lighter, stiffer, and more aerodynamic than titanium, aluminium, or steel. They better absorb road vibrations, improving comfort. Handsling’s carbon frames combine efficiency, responsiveness, and durability, advantages that make them ideal for performance cycling.

settings.title: Do carbon frames meet international safety standards?
settings.content: Handsling’s carbon frames undergo over 500,000 load cycles in fatigue testing and surpass ISO 4210 standards. All Handsling frames are UCI-approved to meet the strict requirements for elite racing.

settings.title: Where are Handsling frames manufactured?
settings.content: Handsling frames are designed in the UK but the carbon frames are handmade in Shenzhen, China, by our partner factory, which Handsling has used exclusively since 2018. We have worked with the same engineer since 2015, who is now the factory owner. Unlike brands that chase the lowest price, Handsling prioritises production consistency and quality, and a long-term collaboration on product development and refinement.

settings.title: What parts of a bespoke carbon bike can be personalised?
settings.content: Every detail of a Handsling bespoke carbon bike can be tailored. Riders choose their frame size, handlebar width, stem length, crank length, and gear ratios. On top of that, they can select the paint colour and finish, along with every component, such as wheels, groupsets, saddle or tyres. This level of customisation ensures a perfect fit for your body and a design that truly reflects your style.

settings.title: Are custom carbon bikes worth the investment?
settings.content: Yes, if you value fit, performance, and long-term quality. Handsling’s bespoke carbon bikes are tailored to your measurements, built from high-performance materials, and proven in racing. This creates a bicycle that lasts, performs, and feels uniquely yours – unlike off-the-shelf options.

settings.title: What makes Handsling’s carbon bikes unique in the cycling industry?
settings.content: Handsling’s British carbon bikes stand out for their blend of craftsmanship, innovation, and quality control, while offering riders more personalisation and direct support. This approach results in bespoke bikes that balance performance engineering with a more individual, rider-focused experience.

settings.title: How long does it take to design and build a custom carbon bike?
settings.content: Most Handsling custom builds are ready in around 4-6 weeks, depending on paint andcomponent choices. Every bike is hand-assembled in our UK factory, ensuring your custom carbon bike arrives both fully personalised and precision-built.

settings.title: Can I visit the Handsling factory in Hampshire, in the UK?
settings.content: Absolutely – visits can be arranged by appointment, giving riders the chance to see where our bikes are designed and assembled. It’s also an opportunity to discuss paint and build optionsdirectly with our expert workshop team, who are all experienced bike riders and racers. To arrange a visit, contact us at sales@handslingbikes.com or call 01420 612700.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content: Learn about Handsling bikes and what separates us from the competition. For questions on ordering, delivery, maintenance, and much more, go to our support centre.
